course_description: An examination of the fundamental theories of media from Marshall McLuhan to the present. Critical readings address issues like interactivity, embodiment, identity, culture, and power relations in the digital age.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
